comment.author: 42288525@N03
comment._content: Sir Edward Twining - afterwards The Right Honourable The Lord Twining - G.C.M.G., M.B.E. (1889-1967), Governor of Tanganyika Territory, 1949–1958.

comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: This address by the Governor was part of the ceremony for the return of Mkwawa's skull to the Hehe people, on 9 June 1954, at Kalenga, near Iringa in that district.  The figure on the right is Chief Adam Sapi, the Chief of the Hehe, being Mkwawa's grandson. He is dressed in the traditional Hehe fashion. It had been Sir Edward Twining's personal achievement to have arranged for the return of the skull from the Bremen Anthropological Museum in Germany where it had been kept.
